intro: Psychotria yaracuyensis, commonly known as the Yaracuyensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Venezuela and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of tropical rainforests. Psychotria yaracuyensis is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical significance in traditional medicine.
